title: Bug 37021 - Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files. The bug is observed when running tests in the 'new/binaryWarnings' folder. To reproduce the problem, execute the code provided in the folder. Please note that these tests may generate false positives as filename checking is not enabled in harness verification of messages. In AJDT, it was noticed that if the filename does not make sense to AJDT, it is simply omitted.
OB: When declaring warnings and targeting .class files from injars, the sourcepath is incorrectly displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'
EB: The sourcepath in declare warning messages should be displayed as 'app/Main.class' instead of 'app.Main.class'
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Go to the 'new/binaryWarnings' folder
2. Execute the code provided
3. Check the declare warning messages and verify that the sourcepath is displayed as 'app/Main.class'
